a-icon/type.description: Type of the ant design icon

a-icon/style.description: Style properties of icon, like fontSize and color

a-icon/component.description: The component used for the root node. This will override the type property.

a-icon/theme.description: Theme of the ant design icon

a-icon/twoToneColor.description: Only support the two-tone icon. Specific the primary color.
